Interface ServiceWatcher

All Known Subinterfaces:
ServiceRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
LeasedServiceRegistry, OSGiServiceRegistry
public interface ServiceWatcher

Something that watches for services.

Nested Class Summary
static interface ServiceWatcher.Handle<T>
          Handle to a watched service.
 
Field Summary
static java.lang.String SERVICE_FILTER
          Service property ("service.filter") set by ServiceWatcher services to an LDAP filter that matches services they are interested in.
 
Method Summary

Field Detail

SERVICE_FILTER

static final java.lang.String SERVICE_FILTER
Service property ("service.filter") set by ServiceWatcher services to an LDAP filter that matches services they are interested in.

Method Detail

Ask the watcher to start watching the given service.

Parameters:

properties - service properties
Returns:
handle to watched service, null if the watcher is not interested
